title: Unknown friend
body: I always have people on my friends list that i forget about, is there a way to check if we have played a game together or something like that?

replies.body: There currently isn't a way to see what game you've played with a friend automatically.  My best suggestion would be to right click on a new friend and edit their note to keep track of who they are.  This can be especially helpful if you have lots of friends.  Hope that helps!
